@bchesky @CNTraveler restoring faith in humans everywhere
@elementalPaul totally ....it's a gorgeous day for it but it was a tad icy in the pavements, impressed I remained upright
@sacks_jo nearly friggan killed me ....total beasting ....that will be last nights vino collapso sweated out ... xx
10k and a killer Cavefit session .... not the worst way to start a Sunday
@The_Josiekitten @AllRunnersHere thank you, it's only a little tester to the gym and back 😊
@AllRunnersHere had to take a week off for some aches ... first run in 7 days and I feel nervous
@AllRunnersHere race day means holiday and party ...long run is good for the soul

@AllRunnersHere tend to sign up without checking what is like ....some are quite the surprise
@The_Josiekitten @youcaring I went to school with her son, I just hope when I hit 70 I have the gumption to do something like this
Can is ask all my twitterati to retwwet this awesome lady's mission...best fundraiser https://t.co/CHzsdic2m9
@AllRunnersHere shite ... I lasted 32 days ...I think I will do it every year for 32 days
@lewclarke1 best get insurance booked early ...
Reposting as I love this ....you can always make a difference...and yes it is real. https://t.co/CHzsdic2m9
No LSR this weekend but Cavefit and a 6.5 miler will do for the day ...really must start some marathon training soon ... #asicsfrontrunner
There is no barrier to making a difference... this is awesome ... https://t.co/rFWoza5OlR
@GraziaUK think it is quite ageist to suggest as a 30th and a little rude ....perhaps 'significant birthday'...thought you guys knew better
@ultralouweezy well that's the plan ...run in the morning drink in the evening ....best kinda days 😊
Birthday in 2 weeks, time for some serious core work for party frock ....
@AllRunnersHere wish I had a dog ... Have my friends dog sometimes....if I try to run with her she just lies down and plays dead
When you pop to the local supermarket and forget to bang your phone or door keys you know the day isn't starting well ....
@The_Josiekitten @sacks_jo @wilberf0rce @runningido @AllRunnersHere and me.... seriously climbing into a cold tent after a run ... no chance
@sacks_jo @AllRunnersHere @wilberf0rce @jean1951pay oh yes, might need a case of Pinot ...
@AllRunnersHere @sacks_jo @wilberf0rce by cooking skills you mean bank card for eating out 😉
@AllRunnersHere @sacks_jo @wilberf0rce @RunnersKnees yip, definitely not selling there ...
@RunnersKnees guess I have been lucky then, bt and new shoes for first ever marathon.... And yup new trail shoes for first trail marathon
@ultralouweezy @sacks_jo that's one of the many reasons why it would be better
@AllRunnersHere red wine ....
@sacks_jo @ultralouweezy it's the real Inauguration party ...Lou's inauguration as domestic goddess
@sacks_jo @ultralouweezy doesn't that just sound lovely 😊
@ultralouweezy we may never leave ....
@ultralouweezy it's a well known fact the chocolates brownies pair remakably well with a glass of red .... I'll bring the Pinot Noir ...
@ultralouweezy @sacks_jo v impressive .... Next you will be telling us you got a full nights sleep ....
@lewclarke1 oh dearie me, did it proper good then ....good luck with recovery
@runningido @AllRunnersHere me ....always have been
@AllRunnersHere managed 7 miles the day after London last year.... Mainly because I kinda got lost ...
@JonW_NewRunner @AllRunnersHere wasn't it a recovery run from a half marathon though? Hence the point in it being too long ....
@AllRunnersHere I tend to just run at whatever pace my legs allow .... Which can anything from good to shocking 😏
@AllRunnersHere me allegedly ..... Not going so well, another one where I will just have to cram the miles and hope for the best 😏
@Tircoeds @AllRunnersHere oh gawd and I hated every friggan mile of that one too
Struggled tonight but circuits and another 5 miles in the bank....slow start to the years mileage ... #ASICSFrontRunner #2017BeTheBest
@speedymelr @ASICSUK yes ....and gutted...although they are £100 up here last season ...
@ultralouweezy don't recognise that at all ....
@AllRunnersHere that's most of my mornings ....
@AllRunnersHere @Ibby_tri @cyclingdaddypig such a charming invitation I can't imagine why you would not have taken up such a kind offer
@Ibby_tri @AllRunnersHere they jst lucky they can drive taster than I run or they would have been wearing it
@Ibby_tri @AllRunnersHere I had McDonald's drink thrown out of a car at me, fortunately it missed ...#twunts
@lewclarke1 @AllRunnersHere @wilberf0rce that sounds so wrong ..... 🙉
@Msmelburt well f you scared him. And he an away leaving his snack that is another option ... 😊

@Msmelburt maybe if you asked him about it, he would share it ....
@race_check @pipinmotion @UKRunChat will do at some point today

@lewclarke1 jst make sure you note them in next years diary ....
@race_check @pipinmotion @UKRunChat may even go back this year ...
@pipinmotion @race_check @UKRunChat Athens...still my favourite road race
@RunnersKnees Barcelona and Brighton
@AllRunnersHere well aside from commute to gym...need to get a decent LSR above 15 miles ..
@MikesEUmaras @maratobarcelona no plan am more of a winging it type .... just building miles and some strength and core ...
@MikesEUmaras @maratobarcelona first decent bit of mileage I have done ...and the pace was a happy accident ...not my norm 😊
@maratobarcelona well I guess that's the training underway ...better late than never ...#ASICSFrontRunner… https://t.co/qgEP8qzVB2
@shellmoby wash thy mouth out .... No such thing as too many surely ...
@AllRunnersHere how do you define older ..... #notgrowingup
@sacks_jo @The_Josiekitten ah see all is well in the world now 😊
@sacks_jo @The_Josiekitten but would you swap me coffee revels for the orange ones ....
@sacks_jo @The_Josiekitten now they could be good
@timsacks @AllRunnersHere @sacks_jo @RunnersKnees also I might be slightly weird 😏
@timsacks @AllRunnersHere @sacks_jo @RunnersKnees hate anything orange flavoured, just like real oranges
@AllRunnersHere @sacks_jo @UKRunChat sounds like a plan ... and well if you gonna cut lose then best place to do it 😊
@sacks_jo @RunnersKnees now if it was mint matchmakers, it might have been tempting ....but to run 26.2 and then give me orange, I may cry 😝
@ultralouweezy now that looks like it's on steroids
@ultralouweezy and am thinking so was the fox
@ultralouweezy I think I am more shocked at you being in London to be honest ....
@AllRunnersHere thought I would just run the one race as a fundraiser in honour of my Dad .... Could never imagined the races I have done
@kimberleyjmil thank you my lovely 😘 xx
@kimberleyjmil Thanks Hun, needed new ones for Cavefit, or any excuse ☺️ xx
Cavefit done, 10k done, right Saturday what you got next for me...and new trainers arrived today ....… https://t.co/m9SPB9wwAm
@lewclarke1 small mercies I guess .... Although the ancient art of pint lifting makes most folk ambidextrous 😊
@AllRunnersHere when I am dead....

@lewclarke1 Is it your dominant hand that you bust? Good luck with the op .. Xx
